author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus victims' family urges people to 'stay at home'
description: Relatives of Pat Bewley, 80, asking others not to be selfish and give the NHS a chance to cope.
content:
Image copyrightTonyPickphotoImage caption
 Pat Bewley died at West Suffolk Hospital on Tuesday
The family of an 80-year-old coronavirus victim have urged others to "give the NHS a chance" and stay at home. 
Pat Bewley's family discovered he had contracted … [+1813 chars]
